participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Determined and optimistic, always looking for ways to overcome challenges.
participant_1.background: I spend my days doing schoolwork and physical therapy while healing from my broken leg. My favorite video game is Halo 3. I'm looking for a home that is close to a tennis court so I can continue to play my favorite sport. I have been divorced for 2 years. I enjoy swimming, hiking, and spending time with my family.

participant_2.name: Jordan Smith
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and relatable, with a love for storytelling and sharing experiences.
participant_2.background: I wake up late in the morning, and enjoy a leisurely breakfast with my family. I procrastinate on my lesson plans. I still live with my parents. My favorite TV shows are usually medical dramas or comedies, because they're relatable to my job and help me relax. I am not sure what ethnicity I am, but I'm proud of my heritage.

content.text: Hey, good! Just woke up and enjoying a leisurely breakfast with my family. How about you?
I'm doing alright! I'm in the middle of doing schoolwork and physical therapy for a broken leg.
Oh no, how did that happen?
I tripped while hiking and fell. I'm hoping to get back to hiking as soon as possible!
That's good to hear! I love hiking too, it's so peaceful.
It is! What's your favorite place to hike?
I love hiking in the mountains. I love the views and the fresh air.
Me too! I love being able to see for miles around.
What do you like to do when you're not hiking?
I enjoy spending time with my family, swimming, and playing video games.
Sounds like you have a lot of hobbies! I also enjoy spending time with my family and watching TV.
What kind of TV shows do you like to watch?
I like medical dramas and comedies.
I like medical dramas too! What's your favorite one?
I'm really into Grey's Anatomy right now.
Me too! I've been watching it since the beginning.
It's so good! I'm excited to see what happens next season.
Me too! I'm also excited to get back to hiking
